Text: CitizensHere is the scope of the deal with Citizens Utilities there are a couple of things we will have to mention in the contract that are not addressed in this letter That all load balancing will be handled by injection and withdrawal from storage and that these incremental costs ie variable charges will be paid by Citizens I need to work out a predetermined load profile with Citizens and that profile will need to be in the contract This load profile will be used as a guide and the contract language will need to be able to accommodate nomination changes on a daily basis at our discretion Im sure you will need further explanation so feel to call me Thanks again for all you help Paul

CIG TransportationHere is the letter I faxed to CIG on Friday Notice how well written it is Ill be in town this week so lets do dinner either Wednesday or Thursday

Confidentiality AgreementWould you please prepare a CA between ENA and Petroglyph Energy Inc my contact there is Craig Saldene however the person on their side who will be signing the agreement is Robert C Murdock PresidentCEO If there is any additional information that you need call me and I will be happy to give you Craigs number so you can leave me the F alone Paul

PSCO AssignmentsWe changed the LD language to reflect a cash out price of CIG Gas Daily plus any penalties We dropped the administrative fee Hopefully your OK with this change Forwarded by Paul T LucciNAEnron on PM Nicole Cortez AM Sent by Nicole Cortez To Paul T nron cc Subject PSCO Assignments
Im back in town so take me out
Happy HourI hope youre feeling better We are thinking about a happy hour tomorrow and inviting those girls that Dan met last time he was down here Are you doing anything Friday Night Paul

Happy HourForwarded by Paul T LucciNAEnron on PM Paul T Lucci AM Sent by Paul T Lucci To cc Subject Happy Hour Hello As you know I got your email address from Dan Bump we are trying to put a happy hour together for tomorrow Ive got about guys committed and no girls which is why we NEED you and all your friends Dan says you guys are a lot of fun but most importantly very HOT So what are your plans tomorrow Paul

Re Happy HourForwarded by Paul T LucciNAEnron on PM Shannon K Spencer on AM To cc Subject Re Happy Hour Gosh Im not sure I can live up to that advanced billingIll try to be fun but you must remember the hot part is coming from a married guy Actually I was planning on going out with or other girls tomorrow night but Im sure we can move it up a few hours no Im not always such a pushover Sounds like fun let me know the detailslook forward to meeting yall

Greely Gas ExhibitI need to have an exhibit prepared showing the specifics of the deal we have with Greely Gas for the upcoming summer The attachment below highlights all the deal parameters Greely is in the process of reviewing the master firm agreement and would like to sign this exhibit at the same time Please call me if you have any questions Thanks again for all your help Paul PS Has Dave found a wife on the internet yet Ive found a few girls there Id marry

Draft of Greeley Exhibitare the changes Greely has made to the exhibit please incorporate these changes into the final exhibit for the master firm agreement Thanks Paul Forwarded by Paul T LucciNAEnron on AM Poole Jr Robert W on PM To cc Hack John W Subject Draft of Greeley Exhibit Paul I am sending you this draft of the exhibit I think it has all of the elements John discussed with you on the phone this afternoon I will run it by him this afternoon or tomorrow morning If I have any other changes after John has looked at it I will send the revisions to ASAP If you have any questions please feel free to give me a call Enron Greeley Biddoc Enron Greeley Biddoc

PSCO AssignmentsWe changed the LD language to reflect a cash out price of CIG Gas Daily plus any penalties We dropped the administrative fee Hopefully your OK with this change Forwarded by Paul T LucciNAEnron on PM Nicole Cortez AM Sent by Nicole Cortez To Paul T nron cc Subject PSCO Assignments

New Rockiesare the pipeline expansions within or out of the Rockies Pipeline Capacity In Service Date Delivery Region CIG Dthd Fall Mid Continent Trail Blazer Dthd Fall Mid Continent WIC Med Bow Dthd Fall Rockies Cheyenne Hub Kern River Dthd Summer So Cal Border Pipeline Expansions Currently in Open Season Pipeline Capacity In Service Date Delivery Region Coastal Connection Dthd Fall Mid Continent Williams Dthd Fall Mid Continent Northern Border Dthd Fall Mid Continent via Northern Border All these proposed pipelines currently have no firm contractual commitments we believe only one project will be built and that the true inservice date is sometime in It takes months from start to finish for these green field projects

I Rock Forwarded by Paul T LucciNAEnron on PM Poole Jr Robert W AM To cc Subject Paul Thanks for getting back to me this afternoon I am sorry that Enron did not have the best bid in the last round of RFPs Greeley sent out for the upcomming winter season However I will look forward to receiving your bid in the future I just wanted to take this opportunity to thank you and Theresa for the excellent customer service Greeley has received regarding the current summer deal Thanks Again Robert Poole

FW Its ready now DocPass it on if you want Forwarded by Paul T LucciNAEnron on AM Pieper Rick AM To cc Subject FW Its ready now Doc Original Message From Lori Pieper Sent Wednesday August AM To Subject Its ready now Doc Docdoc Docdoc
Re FW RetexExelon Debeque Cc I have let this slip since our last conversation I agree we do need to get this fixed I will get back on it today Paul

Re donation to my charity familyI will not put a check in the mail I would not should not put it in a pail or sign it with a nail Ill give it to you when I see you in Houston so for now your out ha ha Home Address Paul Lucci Yates Court Broomfield CO Paul
Rethink I owe you a call
Re Christmas Spiritwhats up Put me in for Ill have to give you the money next time I see you or maybe NOT Have you heard from Barry yet let me know whats going on with you

Plane rideA man boarded an airplane and took his seat As he settled in he glanced up and saw a very beautiful woman boarding the plane He soon realized she was heading straight toward his seat Low and behold she took the seat right beside his Eager to strike up a conversation he blurted out Business trip or vacation She turned smiled and said Business Im going to the annual Nymphomaniac Convention in Chicago He swallowed hard Here was the most gorgeous woman he had ever seen sitting next to him and she was going to a meeting for nymphomaniacs Struggling to maintain his composure he calmly asked Whats your business role at this convention Lecturer she responded I use my experience to debunk some of the popular myths about sexuality Really what myths are those he asked Well she explained one popular myth is that African American men are the most well endowed when in fact its the Native American Indian who is most likely to possess that trait Another popular myth is that French men are the best lovers when actually it is the men of Jewish descent We have however found that the best potential lover in all categories is the Southern redneck The woman started to feel a little uncomfortable and blushed Im sorry she said I shouldnt really be discussing this with you I dont even know your name Tonto the man said Tonto Goldstein but my friends call me Bubba
